Information about payments and service m: Information about payments and service management
Servers are provided on a pre-payment ba: Servers are provided on a pre-payment basis. The minimal payment period is 1 month. For server renewal you should add funds to your personal accounts in due time and set up automatic renewal for your server. In the 'Dedicated servers' module you can click the 'Renew' icon to renew the server for a desired period.
